definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Smart software can also reduce medical errors.
sentences.chinese: 高智能的软体也可以减少医疗疏失。

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种智能仪表交互界面的软件开发自动化技术。

sentences.english: This paper is introduced a new method of human-simulating intelligent control (HSIC).
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种新的仿人智能控制方法。

sentences.english: These hospitals are required to install the hardware and software to process smart-card transactions.
sentences.chinese: 要求这些医院安装处理智能卡交易的硬件和软件。

sentences.english: Our intelligent crime has been very outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 我国的智能化犯罪已经十分突出。

sentences.english: An intelligent electric power steering system was designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种智能电动式电子控制动力转向系统。

sentences.english: But smart-phones and internet-connected television sets have changed that.
sentences.chinese: 但是智能手机和网络电视机改变了人们这一想法。

sentences.english: The AD7712 is ideal for use in smart, microcontroller-based systems.
sentences.chinese: AD7712非常适合基于微控制器的智能系统应用。

sentences.english: Automatic Test Paper is a combination of multi-objective constrained optimization problem.
sentences.chinese: 智能组卷是一个多约束目标的组合优化问题。

sentences.english: Other handset makers are also looking to tap the market for low-priced smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 其他手机生产商也在寻求进入廉价智能手机市场。

sentences.english: Map the data into variables intelligently.
sentences.chinese: 将数据智能地映射到变量。

sentences.english: A intelligence system for the analysis of river and sea physiognomy is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了河海地质地貌的智能分析系统。

sentences.english: It is discussed how to apply intelligent regulator to control the combustion value of mixing gas.
sentences.chinese: 诣在探讨应用智能调节器控制混合煤气热值。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic back-up radar is a set of safety assistant installation applied on auto back-up.
sentences.chinese: 智能倒车雷达是一套汽车倒车时的安全辅助装置。

sentences.english: And non-Apple smartphone prices continue to fall.
sentences.chinese: 非苹果品牌的智能手机价格继续下跌。

sentences.english: In the area of WAP, smart phones are meant to be the winner of terminals.
sentences.chinese: 无线互联时代，智能手机注定成为新的终端王者。
